headline.main: 2 ARMIES IN ITALY GAIN DESPITE MUD; Triple Road Junction of Teano Falls as Allies Increase Threat to Isernia

lead_paragraph: ALGIERS, Nov. 1 -- As rain swept the entire Italian front, the Allied Fifth and Eighth Armies pressed indomitably forward through mud yesterday to increase their threats to Isernia and Venafro. Further advances in the center of the line ranged up to four miles.
abstract: Allies advance despite rain and mud; 5th Army captures Teano, important junction for roads leading north; 8th Army seizes 2 towns in Isernia sec
